remarks: Implicit substitution of class for equivalence class of ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-1995.)
statement:
ecoptocl.1 $e |- S = ( ( B X. C ) /. R ) $.
ecoptocl.2 $e |- ( [ <. x , y >. ] R = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ecoptocl.3 $e |- ( ( x e. B /\ y e. C ) -> ph ) $.
ecoptocl $p |- ( A e. S -> ps ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d ps x y $.
